channel.title: Exam Preparation on MTH 121
channel.description: Recent content in Exam Preparation on MTH 121

item.title: Overview
item.description: How to Study Start early! Remember, you should be staying on pace with the lecture schedule. It will not be a fun experience if you wait until a day or so before the exam to start your work. Review your Online Homework problems. As you complete the homework problems, write down your full solutions with explanations in a neat, organized notebook. This way when exam time comes, you have a nice solutions manual, you created yourself - that you can then refer back to if you get stuck on a problem.

item.title: Exam 1 Study Guide
item.description: Logistics Date: Thursday, September 26, 2019 Time: 8:45pm-10:15pm ET - (it is a 1.5 hour exam) Location: Your exam location is posted on UBlearns. What to Bring: You should bring multiple pens / pencils, your approved calculator, and a photo ID. Calculator: You are allowed to use only the Texas Instruments TI-30XIIS calculator on the exam. All other calculators are prohibited. See the Calculator and Reference Policy in the syllabus for more details.
